## VerticalSearchState.noResults property

The data for when no results are returned in the vertical search.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
noResults?: {
        allResultsForVertical: AllResultsForVertical;
        alternativeVerticals: VerticalResults[];
    };
```
